title: mobile: Wire Settings export and delete account
body:
## Problem
Settings Export Data and Delete Account menu items not functional.

## Requirements

### Export Data
- Tap shows format selection (JSON or CSV)
- Calls export API endpoint
- Downloads/shares file
- Shows success toast

### Delete Account
- Tap shows confirmation dialog
- Require email con

title: mobile: Implement toast notifications for actions
body:
## Problem
No feedback when actions complete or fail. Users don't know if operations succeeded.

## Requirements

### Toast System
- Success toasts (green): Transaction created, Budget saved, etc.
- Error toasts (red): Failed to save, Network error, etc.
- Info toasts (blue): General notifications

title: mobile: Add loading skeletons to all screens
body:
## Problem
Screens show nothing or placeholder during loading. Need skeleton loaders for better UX.

## Requirements

### Screens to Add Skeletons
- DashboardScreen: Summary card skeleton, stats skeleton, transaction list skeleton
- TransactionsScreen: Transaction item skeletons (5-10 items)
- Budge

title: mobile: Implement pull-to-refresh on all list screens
body:
## Problem
No pull-to-refresh functionality on any screen.

## Requirements

### Screens to Update
- DashboardScreen (refresh all data)
- TransactionsScreen (refresh transactions)
- BudgetsScreen (refresh budgets)
- SharingScreen (refresh shared expenses)

### Implementation
- Use React Native Refre

title: mobile: Create EmptyState and ErrorState components
body:
## Problem
Screens need consistent empty and error states. Currently placeholder text only.

## Requirements

### EmptyState Component
**Props**
- `icon: string` (icon name)
- `title: string`
- `message: string`
- `actionLabel?: string`
- `onAction?: () => void`

**Usage Examples**
- No transactions

title: mobile: Create MonthSelector component
body:
## Problem
Dashboard and Budgets screens need month navigation. No reusable component exists.

## Requirements

### Component: MonthSelector
Reusable component for month navigation

### Props
- `selectedMonth: Date`
- `onMonthChange: (date: Date) => void`
- `minMonth?: Date` (optional limit)
- `maxM

title: mobile: Create CategoriesScreen for category management
body:
## Problem
Settings shows Categories menu item but no screen exists.

## Requirements

### Screen: CategoriesScreen
Navigate from SettingsScreen Categories row

### Display
- Tabs: Income / Expense
- List of categories per type
- Category color indicator
- Archived categories (collapsed section)

##

title: mobile: Create AccountsScreen for account management
body:
## Problem
Settings shows Accounts menu item but no screen exists.

## Requirements

### Screen: AccountsScreen
Navigate from SettingsScreen Accounts row

### Display
- List of user accounts
- Active account highlighted
- Account type badge (Personal, Partner, Joint, Other)
- Account color indicator

title: mobile: Create ProfileScreen in Settings
body:
## Problem
Settings shows Profile menu item but no screen exists.

## Requirements

### Screen: ProfileScreen
Navigate from SettingsScreen Profile row

### Display Fields
- Display name
- Email (read-only)
- Preferred currency

### Editable Fields
- Display name (text input)
- Preferred currency (pi

title: mobile: Wire onboarding screens to onboardingStore
body:
## Problem
All 7 onboarding screens are UI-only. No data persists.

## Current State
- Currency selection visual only (USD pre-selected, not saved)
- Categories all pre-selected, not tracked
- Budget shows $2,000 static, no input
- Complete screen shows hardcoded summary

## Requirements

### Onboar

title: mobile: Create ShareExpenseScreen with split calculator
body:
## Problem
No way to create shared expenses from mobile.

## Requirements

### Screen: ShareExpenseScreen
Modal from SharingScreen FAB

### Form Steps

**Step 1: Expense Details**
- Description (required)
- Total amount (required)
- Date (default today)
- Category picker

**Step 2: Add Participants*

title: mobile: Create AddBudgetScreen with category picker
body:
## Problem
No way to create budgets from mobile.

## Requirements

### Screen: AddBudgetScreen
Modal presentation from BudgetsScreen

### Form Fields
- Category picker (only categories without budget this month)
- Amount input (planned budget)
- Month selector (default current)
- Currency display (f

title: mobile: Create onboardingStore to persist selections
body:
## Problem
Onboarding screens exist but selections (currency, categories, budget) are not saved. Users complete onboarding with no data persisted.

## Requirements
Create `mobile/src/stores/onboardingStore.ts` with:

### State
- `selectedCurrency: Currency` (USD | EUR | ILS)
- `selectedCategories: s

title: mobile: Create accountsStore for account management
body:
## Problem
No store exists for managing user accounts. Account switching (#78) depends on this.

## Requirements
Create `mobile/src/stores/accountsStore.ts` with:

### State
- `accounts: Account[]`
- `activeAccountId: string | null`
- `isLoading: boolean`
- `error: string | null`

### Actions
- `fet

title: API: PATCH /api/v1/accounts/[id]/activate - Switch active account
body:
Support switching active account from mobile.

**Endpoint:** `PATCH /api/v1/accounts/:id/activate`

**Request Body:** None required

**Response:** Updated user session with new active account

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Low Priority (Misc)

title: API: POST /api/v1/accounts/[id]/set-balance - Set account balance
body:
Support setting account balance from mobile (balance adjustment).

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/v1/accounts/:id/set-balance`

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "targetBalance": 1000.00,
  "currency": "USD",
  "monthKey": "2026-01"
}
```

**Response:** Created adjustment transaction

**Auth:** JWT Bearer tok

title: API: POST /api/v1/exchange-rates/refresh - Refresh exchange rates
body:
Support manual exchange rate refresh from mobile.

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/v1/exchange-rates/refresh`

**Request Body:** None required

**Response:** Updated exchange rates object with USD/EUR/ILS rates

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Low Priority (Misc)

title: API: POST /api/v1/seed-data - Seed sample data
body:
Support mobile onboarding sample data seeding for demo purposes.

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/v1/seed-data`

**Request Body:** None required

**Response:** Summary of seeded data (accounts, categories, transactions created)

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority

title: API: POST /api/v1/budgets/quick - Quick budget creation
body:
Support mobile onboarding quick budget setup.

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/v1/budgets/quick`

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "accountId": "string",
  "categoryId": "string",
  "monthKey": "2026-01",
  "planned": 500.00,
  "currency": "USD"
}
```

**Response:** Created budget object

**Auth:** JWT Bearer

title: API: POST /api/v1/categories/bulk - Bulk create categories
API: PATCH /api/v1/users/me/currency - Update preferred currency
body:
Support mobile currency preference update during onboarding.

**Endpoint:** `PATCH /api/v1/users/me/currency`

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "currency": "USD" | "EUR" | "ILS"
}
```

**Response:** Updated user object

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority (Onb

title: API: POST /api/v1/onboarding/skip - Skip onboarding
body:
Support mobile onboarding skip functionality.

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/v1/onboarding/skip`

**Request Body:** None required

**Response:** Updated user object with `hasCompletedOnboarding: true`

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority (Onboarding)

title: API: POST /api/v1/onboarding/complete - Mark onboarding complete
body:
Support mobile onboarding flow completion.

**Endpoint:** `POST /api/v1/onboarding/complete`

**Request Body:** None required

**Response:** Updated user object with `hasCompletedOnboarding: true`

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority (Onboarding)

title: API: GET /api/v1/recurring - List recurring templates
body:
Mobile needs list endpoint for recurring template data sync.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/recurring`

**Query Parameters:**
- `accountId` (required) - Filter by account
- `isActive` (optional) - Filter by active status

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority (R

title: API: GET /api/v1/holdings - List holdings for account
body:
Mobile needs list endpoint for holdings/asset data sync.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/holdings`

**Query Parameters:**
- `accountId` (required) - Filter by account

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority (Read Endpoints)

title: API: GET /api/v1/categories - List user categories
body:
Mobile needs list endpoint for category data sync.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/categories`

**Query Parameters:**
- `type` (optional) - Filter by INCOME/EXPENSE
- `includeArchived` (optional) - Include archived categories

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priorit

title: API: GET /api/v1/budgets - List budgets for account/month
body:
Mobile needs list endpoint for budget data sync.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/budgets`

**Query Parameters:**
- `accountId` (required) - Filter by account
- `month` (optional) - Filter by month (YYYY-MM format)

**Auth:** JWT Bearer token

**Reference:** docs/API_AUDIT.md - Medium Priority (Read Endp

title: API: GET /api/v1/transactions - List transactions with filters
body:
Mobile needs list endpoint for transaction data sync.

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/transactions`

**Query Parameters:**
- `accountId` (required) - Filter by account
- `month` (optional) - Filter by month (YYYY-MM format)
- `categoryId` (optional) - Filter by category
- `type` (optional) - Filter by I

title: API: GET /api/v1/users/me - Current user profile
body:
## Description
Implement REST API endpoint to get the current user's profile information.

## Endpoint
`GET /api/v1/users/me`

## Response
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "string",
    "email": "string",
    "name": "string",
    "preferredCurrency": "USD|EUR|ILS",
    "createdAt"

title: API: GET /api/v1/dashboard - Dashboard summary data
body:
## Description
Implement REST API endpoint to get dashboard summary data for mobile app.

## Endpoint
`GET /api/v1/dashboard`

## Query Parameters
- `month`: YYYY-MM (optional, defaults to current month)
- `accountId`: string (optional, filter by account)

## Response
```json
{
  "success": true,
